input.sentences: in the mornings | [female] leaves her house to volunteer and teach .
she passes many stores on her way around town .
sometimes there is a lot of traffic .
when she finally gets to her church where she teaches | she is happy .
her students wait for her to arrive | so they they can begin to study .
output.sentences: I woke up early today to get to my volunteer job.
I had to walk through town to catch the bus and passed by the usual shops.
The bus happened to be late due to traffic so I was worried I wouldn't make it on time.
I was finally able to make it to the school and the teacher looked happy to see me.
I helped the students study math for the rest of the day.
